title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your no-nonsense approach to solving problems empowers you to help a loved one over a speed bump on the road of life. However, the situation might seem daunting when you calculate your potential loss of time, money, or energy. But you also gain the benefit of building a stronger interpersonal connection with someone special. You are cosmically deputized to use your might for right while courageous Mars asserts its presence in your 10th House of Public Responsibility. Youre motivated to give your best for the sake of another, and not from self-interest. Offering your strength only helps to make the world stronger. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
